description: Request for Information for the Procurement Process for Enterprise Wi-Fi Local Area Network
full_summary:
### Request for Information for the Procurement Process for Enterprise Wi-Fi Local Area Network

#### Solicitation Information
* **Reference Number**: SSC-23-00023751:T
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM019510/23751
* **Publication Date**: September 7, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: October 13, 2023 @ 2:00 PM EDT

#### Procurement Overview
Shared Services Canada is soliciting information regarding the procurement process for the Enterprise Wi-Fi Local Area Network.

#### Tender Description
The procurement process aims to establish a contract for the design, implementation, and maintenance of the Enterprise Wi-Fi Local Area Network solution to support the business requirements of Shared Services Canada.

#### Relevant Trade Agreements
This procurement allows for participation from bidders under the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

#### Contracting Entity Information
The contracting entity for this procurement is Shared Services Canada, located at:
90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries or questions, please contact:
Annie Goulet, at (613) 408-8344 or (613) 555-5555.

#### Relevant Documents
Relevant documents for this procurement can be downloaded from the following links:
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/2E8BE607-405E-4910-A270-6553E1439FFD
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/1C2605C8-2753-49DF-A162-31135791C4C5
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/C58C2E9F-BCB5-4F35-B86E
